Class BundleTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tum.in.osgi.utility.extender.BundleTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, org.osgi.framework.BundleListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContextBundleTracker, ManifestTracker

    public abstract class BundleTracker
extends Object
implements org.osgi.framework.BundleListener

    Title: BundleTracker

    Description: Tracks active bundles

    Author:
    AMIT KUMAR MONDAL
